author: James Joyce
text: Left Galway today. Send to May at once 140 crowns (60 from Piccolo and the rest yourself) so that I can start at a momentâ€™s notice. Wretched weather. Interview tomorrow with Lidwell and Roberts. If I must be in Trieste for 24 inst wire the money to May. Had to buy all winter clothes for Nora and children. Writing fully in the morning. Jim
